pci_projects_project_storages_containers: The replication rule name must be between 3 and 255 characters. Only ASCII characters are allowed.
Priority must be a whole number between 1 and 1000. The higher the number, the higher the priority.

The prefix must be between 1 and 256 valid UTF-8 characters.
Specify the name of your destination container in the same region as the source or in a different region.

By default, objects will be replicated with their original storage class. You can change this behaviour by selecting the destination storage class.

Define the options that OVHcloud Object Storage must apply during replication, such as selecting eligible objects, migrating them to another storage class, the destination container, or replicating deletion markers.

The key must be between 1 and 128 characters, and the value must be between 1 and 256 characters. Only alphanumeric characters (from a to z or A to Z and from 0 to 9) and certain special characters (+ - = . _ : / @) are allowed. The values 'aws:' and 'ovh:' are reserved.
Add filters to limit the scope of replication. This can be a combination of object tags or prefixes.

You cannot replicate deletion markers if you use tags to filter objects.

The object lock has been enabled on this container. The object lock on the destination container must also be enabled if it has been enabled on the source container.
